page.title: 14HORSERIDING IS MY HOBBY
page.content: MY BIG SISTER HAS A HORSE AND OCCASIONALLY SHE LETS ME RIDE HIM. HE IS KEPT ON A LOCAL FARM AND IN WINTER WE FEED HIM ON PONY NUTS, VEGETABLES AND BRAN, BUT IN SUMMER HE IS PUT OUT TO GRASS. HIS NAME IS 'TIMMY' AND HE IS GREY WITH LOTS OF BLACK SPOTS ALL OVER. HE HAS A SHORT MANE AND LONG TAIL. HE IS 13 HANDS AND IS AN 'APULUSSO'. HE IS 3 YEARS OLD AND I LIKE RIDING HIM ESPECIALLY WHEN HE CANTERS. SOMETIMES HE ROLLS IN THE MUCK AND WE HAVE TO WASH HIM BUT WE DON'T USE A HOSE PIPE BECAUSE IT FRIGHTENS HIM. WHEN I GROOM HIM I USE A DANDY BRUSH ON HIS BODY AND A CURRY COMB FOR HIS MANE AND TAIL. I ALSO CLEAN HIS HOOVES OUT WITH A HOOF PICK AND PUT NEATS FOOT OIL ON THEM.
